name: Spooky Babysitter
description:
Hello! You wanna what is truly out of control? Being a babysitter. and that's exactly what we at Helico Studios did.

In our game, Babysitter, You play as a character who has to watch over babies while they do their best to kill themselves. But that's not it, there's a ghost disturbing all your efforts and may just bring you to your doom. Ensure your babies do not die, for there are multiple ways to them to kill themselves! Good luck, and have fun!
